Key Match Events: Luka Doncic put Patrick Williams on a highlight reel with his creative play
Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls were playing without both Zach LaVine and Lonzo Ball tonight
Post-Match Reflections: The Chicago Bulls finished the night with a 3-5 record and need LaVine as the schedule gets more difficult
Miscellaneous Highlights: Matas Buzelis, a 20-year-old rising star, put up 13 points and 9 rebounds on 44/75/100 shooting from the field
Others: The Bulls' next five opponents are the Minnesota Timberwolves, Atlanta Hawks, Cleveland Cavaliers, New York Knicks, and Cleveland Cavaliers
